definitions: a strong leather strap passing around the hindquarters of a horse harnessed to a vehicle and enabling the horse to push backwards.
shortDefinitions: strong leather strap passing round hindquarters of horse harnessed to vehicle

definitions: a thick rope used to secure the carriage of a cannon on a ship and to absorb the force of the recoil.
shortDefinitions: thick rope used to secure carriages of cannon on ship

definitions: the hair or wool on the hindquarters of an animal.
shortDefinitions: hair or wool on hindquarters of animal
